description.@en: Denouncing the supernatural, you turn away and destroy those who are an anathema to the Material Realm. They burst into blue flames.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, as long as they are classified as a Supernatural creature, you deal [[/roll 2D10]]+[WB] in Damage to a single foe.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but the foe is also set On Fire.

criticalFailure.@en: You are suddenly filled with crippling anxiety, crushed as your god momentarily turns away from you. You suffer [[/roll 2D10+2]] mental Peril and are knocked Prone.

reagents.@en: Your holy symbol, held before you.

system.distance: Any one person you can see
